data.title: The King's Academy
data.meta_description: Our Christ-centered junior high and high school inspires academic excellence and spiritual development. Learn about our The King's Academy today.
data.text:
A Christ-Centered Education

Our faculty & staff are Christian role models who have been called to ministry and have a love for young people.

TKA At A Glance

Check out this quick list of facts to learn more about what TKA has to offer your family.

Visit TKA

Visit our Admissions Center to schedule a tour or have your student shadow for a day.

An Affordable Investment

Your child's education is an investment of a lifetime. We offer generous financial assistance to help families afford a TKA education.

Enduring Relationships

Class retreats, home groups, all-school events, service trips, and more are intentionally designed for students to build relationships with staff and peers.

Servant Leaders

For TKA, the goal of service is for students to be transformed into a servant leader for life.

College Preparatory Education

With the support of highly qualified teachers and college counselors, 99% of our graduates continue on to higher education.

Computer Science & Engineering

We offer hands-on engineering and computer science courses plus robotics teams.

Champions

Our goal is to train up players to be Champions in the classroom, on the field, in the gym, and in life.

Everyone Can Play

With 14 sports and over 60 teams, students can try a new sport or play multiple sports.

Parents as Partners

Parent participation contributes to TKA's reputation as a family-friendly, wholesome environment. Giving of one's time is a precious gift to our school!

Full Steam Ahead Campaign

TKA is raising money to renovate the V Building, a 32,000 sq. ft. two-story building for STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, Math), complete with science labs and a 3,000-square-foot Makerspace. This space will be a place for hands-on learning and collaboration.
